General.Name: Guangdong Hoshion Aluminium Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Hoshion Industrial Aluminium Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, production, processing, and sale of industrial aluminum extrusion products in China. The company offers aluminum alloy profiles and related products and their products, molds, hardware parts, and metal materials. It also provides new energy vehicle battery lower boxes, battery lower box accessories, module structural parts, and battery shell and other battery structural products, as well as body structural products, such as anti-collision beams and chassis sill beams. In addition, the company offers consumer electronics products comprising mobile phone and tablet middle frames and backplanes, notebook computer casings and other consumer electronics plates, computer hard disk arms, laser printer photosensitive drums and other consumer electronics precision structural parts, and mobile phones, as well as power supply housings. Further, it provides structural parts of shower enclosures, strollers, and vacuum cleaners, as well as offers aluminum surface treatment and aluminum rod entrusted processing services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Zhongshan, China.
